content.detailedDescription:
Smoking outside, facing west i noticed a very bright flashing object. at first i thought it was sirus. then i looked and saw sirus above and to the right. the object was 20 deg above horizontal to the sw moving along just above roofline and not following the star path of down and right. it was moving about roughly 10 mph or little slower, as i was watching this slowly move along i-10 or assumed the path. i had time to walk into my house, grab the canon t3i, the tripod and setup the camera. i used the zoom function on the camera (to focus dial). then had the led opened and began to film this with the iphone. i was observing this for about 10 minutes with the video. here is the link to the video on our paranormal group facebook page, i do not have the original. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]    

the object looked round at times, but would change shape, or rotate giving a shape change appearance. it also looked like there was 4 sections, or a pie with 4 equal sections. these would pulsate different lights, and to the nw of my location was a bright amber object at about 30 degrees. another submission. 

i then decided to follow the object, i headed south on kolb road to i-10, then drove west for about 3 miles. i exited craycroft road, went south to a parking lot on the sw corner, and took photos. these are on the same facebook page. the object was now moving faster to the west and further out now. total time was about 20 minutes. sis-in-law was witness during this entire sighting.
content.summary: Pulsating ufo multi colored

content.detailedDescription: I am a paranormal investigator and ufo watcher for about 3 years now. i smoke outside facing west (house is se of tucson). i noticed 2 objects horizontal formation rise above the roof line across the street, then a 3rd object rise below them fast all same speed. when all were visible they formed an inverted v.  they moved upward about 20 degrees, then all in unison moved to the right. the bottom object was moving slight slower after they started to move. i paused to watch for 5-10 seconds, then ran into the house grabbed brother (i scared him the speed i came inside). i grabbed my camera and set it to video mode, but way to dark and the distance was too great. i exited the house went to edge of porch and i could still see the top left object before it went behind the tree across the street horizontally same as the others. they then faded as they were heading north. (bright amber glowing, extreme intense light, welding torch bright). i must say, we see a lot of these out here at night, especially purple flashes that light up rooftops, streets and then sometimes you can see objects moving very fast from these purple flashes. i have seen so many out here, i have night vision, but no way to record.
content.summary: Ascending then direction change fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming outside to smoke a cigarette on december 24, 2013 at approx. 9:15 pm. i saw a really bright red object that was just hovering over my apartments. it was larger than all of the stars in the sky and didn't seem to be as high up as the stars. after approx. 3 minutes it began moving in an easterly direction.  it then stopped, hovered for another minute and dropped another red object out of it. the second red object was about half the size and began slowly flying to the ground.  it didn't leave a trail or anything just was slowly falling toward the ground.  after about another minute the original red object disappeared. this really freaked me out! i watch the sky all of the time and have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Bright red object hovering then moving e, dropped another red object which fell toward the ground and the original object disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and 2 granddaughters and i were driving north on st rt 23 when i noticed a pattern of about 12 bright orange lights in the sky. we were right at cheshire rd. where franklin university is. they seemed to make an arch in the sky but then i would say moved into a kind of kite formation. at first i thought they were christmas lights of some sort ? we pulled off into franklin university's parking lot and by that time, several of them had disappeared. you could see them flicker and fade out. closer to the ground you could see more very bright orange lights moving basically in formation with the others. by the time we pulled out and got back onto 23 northbound, there were 4 very distinct lights still lingering. i got out of the car to try and take pictures but the lighting was pretty bright in the parking lot. they made no sound and they were not fireworks or anything like it. my granddaughters (ages 7 and 8) were scared and that's why i didn't watch the rest. my daughter and i agreed that we'd never seen anything like it. we did call our local law enforcement agency and make a report.
content.summary: pattern of bright orange lights over delaware, ohio christmas eve

content.detailedDescription:
I got home around 7 or 7:15 on christmas eve and was shocked/amazed to see at least three dozen orange-red looking orbs in the sky, appearing from the sw just above the tree line and all of them were ascending up at roughly a 20 or 30 degree angle. all of them were headed in the same direction, though they weren't all going in a perfect row. when each one reached a certain general spot in the sky, the light would quickly fade and disappear. the initial glob was the most impressive point of the 30 minute or so long affair. it slacked off after roughly 5 minutes, only one or two appearing every 10 seconds or so (only lol) until another busier wave .. when you could again see at least a dozen in the sky at once, climbing in altitude until disappearing. it began to slack off after this second wave .. and it became more like a drip .. a few lagging behind every 15-20 seconds .. until it stopped.

that was one of the most incredibly shocking things i've ever witnessed in my life. it just happened about one hour ago. i don't know what to think.
content.summary: Dozens of lights appearing on the horizon to my southeast. came in waves, ascending and fading away.

content.detailedDescription: I was aproxitly 7:30 pm and i'm sitting in my recliner watching my dog in the security camera to tap the door to want to come in when she did i got up and went to the door bent over to un hook her from the cable tie out  when i stood up to throw the cable over the hand rail i noticed a light in the sky heading towards me i said to myself ufo and then realized there was no red or green flashing light as a plane would have, as i watched it get closer i noticed it had a semi oval shape and then a second one appeared that was identical i thought to myself maybe some kind of floating fireworks or chinese lantern or something then all of a sudden another one appeared at this point i new i was looking at something different so i called my wife to come out quick ufo's!! just as she came out the first one seemed to circle around the second and almost merge with it and then float back in line as four more came from the same direction north west as they floated by overhead i told my wife to grab the camera and i was able to get a picture of two i tried to listen for any noise but it was silent. i stood there and watched as they flew away in a southwest direction and disappeared i have to say i felt very nervous during the whole time. the submitted picture are of the fist two standing on my front porch pointing the camera at about 11:00 o'clock
content.summary: One half oval light followed by two more and then another until six lights in a row drifted by.

content.detailedDescription: On the way back from college i noticed how beautiful the sun set was so i pulled my phone out and started take multiple pics. i don't stop taking the pictures for about 20 mins the whole time i'm not really looking at the sky more so if my phone was aiming at the sky and if my finger was on the right spot then well looking at the trees and road to know when to push the button. once i got him i looked at every single one to see which ones i liked, i had about 100 pictures! i came across multiple pictures taking when we got into town that had weird glowing objects in the sky.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sun set. i took a lot of pics with out really looking because we were driving. when i looked back through the pictures i noticed weird objects in a number of the pictures!

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on highway 46 west, just 3 miles west of higway 281. i was traveling toward the city of boerne,tx around 5:15 pm on 12/23/13. as i was driving, i noticed an object out of the corner of my eye. the object didn't move and appeared to hover quite a distance in altitude. around the same time, i noticed a commercial jetliner traveling near the stationary object. i noticed blinking lights and exhaust from the jetliner, while no lighting or exhaust was noticed on the stationary object. as dusk was approaching and the sun was setting in the horizon, the sunlight reflected off of the object. i tried to take a picture of the object with my professional camera, but i had no memory card inside. i then decided to take pictures of the object using a camera phone. i took several pictures of the object, before my sight line of the object was hampered by trees and the road going from a hilly terrain to those of lowlands. i noticed an object in roughly the same direction before, but a few miles to the east of highway 46, traveling west. the object hovered as well, but was very reflective, due to the time of d���y(around 1pm) on a cloudless, sunny day. i had at first attributed this object to be a military plane of some sort, due to its proximity to nearby camp bullis and camp stanley military outposts. now, after viewing the second object , i'm not quite sure. both incidents left me nervous. i couldn't believe that an object like that was displayed in bright daylight. later that night after showing pictures of the object with a friend that lives in the area, i asked him if he had noticed any strange ph���nomena in the skies? he replied that he has never seen anything in the skies, but has heard several military maneuvers nearby at the aforementioned camp bullis.
content.summary: Noticed a small grey metallic object that hovered for several minutes in rural northwest san antonio

content.detailedDescription:
One summer between 1972 and 1973,in the silver lake neighborhood of los angeles, in the vicinity of melrose & virgil, norma and shirley experienced a form of alien contact. it was between 3 & 4 in the afternoon and they were sitting at opposite ends of norma���s 10-ft sofa. norma was straddling the large, padded, round arm end, of the couch and shirley was sitting in a chair at the other end of the couch. that was unusual because they normally sat close together, as they talked.  norma said they were bored and just making small talk when she distinctly said to shirley, ���you are changing and you have a big head���.  norma noticed that shirley���s face had changed.  shirley���s face was smoky white with a large cranial area that tapered down to a pointed chin that was rounded at the tip of the jaw. the eyes were large and medium gray and covered approximately 1/3 of the face. the face had no wrinkles or hair and she felt the face was like a triangle, large at the top and tapering down to a pointed chin. norma didn't see any ears or eyebrows and the vision lasted more than 1 minute and less than 5 minutes. the being had a small mouth that was closed and it was like a slit or a line with no lips. the attached picture is very close to what she saw with the exception of the nose. she didn't remember seeing a pronounced nose or defined nostrils on the face. in the area of where a nose would be, she thinks she saw 2 small dots. norma did not remember receiving any telepathic thoughts or messages. the face did not move or show any type of expression and though she had no knowledge of what she was seeing it brought her a peaceful feeling. when norma told shirley that she was changing, shirley replied that norma���s face was also changing in the same manner. norma now had a big head and big eyes and shirley was no more frightened by the experience than norma was. when talking about the experience, shirley would say it was all very weird.   
 
     norma and shirley would talk about the strange event over the years and neither one could understand what their weird experience was all about. not until the book communion by whitley strieber that was published in feb of 1987 did they have a better understanding of ufo���s and aliens. however, both had very different viewpoints on what they experienced after reading the book.  norma still feels that the experience was positive and is still searching for answers on what she experienced. shirley stopped talking about the event after she read the book.  she became completely silent and refuses to talk about the matter to this day. shirley felt it was an evil presence and as time went on she could barely remember the incident and in time she has completely forgotten the event and will not discuss it. norma had on several occasions and just recently asked shirley about the experience.  however shirley says she no longer remembers the incident and remained silent when questioned about the event.  norma feels she won���t discuss it with anyone else.       
 
     i asked norma if she had any prior knowledge of the subject of ufo���s and she had none whatsoever. it wasn't until she read the book communion and saw the picture of the gray headed alien on the cover of the book that everything fell into place and made more sense. norma felt the experience was positive because the face conveyed a very friendly and peaceful appearance. it wasn't scary and it emanated a high level of consciousness as if you were looking at a buddha or another religious deity. it���s as close to a religious experience that she ever felt.   
    she now believes that what happened to shirley and her was an encounter with an out-of-this-world being.
content.summary: Alien head projected onto 2 human faces

content.detailedDescription: I was working outside on a forklift at work. i started down the ally way going west when i noticed a bright blue light in the distance, above the lamoile canyons. i watched it for about 10 minutes. it seemed to dip down then raise back up. toward the end of this it just blinked out. then about 2 minutes after, i seen a plane heading toward that direction. their is an airport here for small planes, but this was not a small or large plane. not to mention, all the planes i have seen coming in and out of here have white, red or yellow lights. this was truly special. i have seen this before. but i am not sure when. it was in california on my way to vegas and the i-15. now i am in northern nevada. kind of odd.
content.summary: Working outside on forklift and seen a bright blue light.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out ne facing window from the second story of my home to check on the weather. it was approximately 9:50 pm tonight. all at once the sky in the distance lit up red and orange mottled colors. my first thought was a fireball streaked across the ne sky. i believe that is what it was. maybe it will be on the news tomorrow. that's all.
content.summary: Fireball in northeast?

content.detailedDescription: i cant even believe im on this site i did a google search. what i just say under 30 min ago is unexplainable. it was in no way a helicopter, but i cant even put into words what i saw. i have perserved the area behind my house that was affected by the object. can someone call me to take a report and should i collect samples. i also dont know if i should report this to the authorities. looking for guidance. i have a photo on my iphone.
content.summary: Orb hovered above trees for three to five minutes and dispeared left the surrounding ground warm and discolored

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on top of dock over water at lake martin. photographing the sunset.  then continued to watch the sky in hopes of spotting meteorites or fireballs.  watched planes cross over in the evening sky.  real awareness of all nature around.  noticed planes had stopped for a while.  looked south and noticed a bright light and thought there is not a tower light that direction and saw a bright light.  thought it was a plane.  then as it moved north east thought it was a helicopter scanning with heat scensors.  then realized i heard no sounds.  the light traveled directly over a mountain peak across the water, as i was sitting above the lake.  the lights stopped over the peak of the mountain.  turned its lights towards me as it hovered over the peak. the lights changedbfrom yellow to red. shown in my eyes for several minutes.  felt like i was having my eyes scanned.  i could not look away nor wanted to.  it then turned and retreated the direction it came from but faster and i saw three white lights as it left.  left faster than it came.  then went down behind mountain range.  i just sat there without fear or explanation.
content.summary: Lights red and yellow then three white lights as it retreated behind mountain.

content.detailedDescription: Saw hovering over neighbors house in a distant, wasn't a star thought it was piece of the comet.Took pics zoom in its 3 lights like triangle.Then after hr or 2 disappeared.
content.summary: 3 lights like triangle, looked looker not moving just hovered then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in by backyard with a friend having a cigarette,,, and we both saw about a few hundred feet from us over top of houses appeared a bright bluish green light which was a cuple hundred feet in diameter ..It lasted for between 3-5 seconds and disaapeared ..We both at the same time said; "did you see that "?
content.summary: Big flashing blue green light over the houses for a few seconds

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: While driving on a county road south west of purcell, oklahoma, myself and two others observed a bright, pulsating, multicolored, sphere-shaped light above the northern horizon. it appeared to be stationary and was probably 10-15 miles away from us over the norman, oklahoma area. i have observed aircraft with their landing lights on coming and going from the oklahoma city area for years, but none of them pulsated and changed colors as this light did. it seemed to flash red, white, blue, orange and possibly green in quick procession. we joked that it was a "christmas star" because of the colors and the fact that it quite nearly looked like an led light in the sky. we lost sight of it because we went down a hill. by the time we got a view of the horizon again, it was gone. i have observed many strange aircraft lights along that horizon in recent years and it seems that more and more reports of these lights are being made. i suspect it might have something to do with tinker air force base.
content.summary: "christmas star" - pulsating, muliticolored light observed on northern horizon

content.detailedDescription: Hi, the images i have are from a trail camera that i placed on the edge of a farm field on thurs 12/19-20/13. i put the camera there to get pics of deer as i was hunting on saturday. when i retuned home in berlin , md on saturday afternoon i looked at the pics on my computer and noticed about 15 pics of what i think is the sun setting ( which i didn't think about when i placed the camera that day ) the sun? is or appears blacked-out but there is a blue orb which appears to move around the blacked-out object. the pics are interesting and don't know if you would like to see them? let me know and i will try to figure out how to forward them. tks bryan  i am not sure how to attach these
content.summary: Trail cam pics

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving southward headed to airport rd in santa fe, nm and i was on my cell phone talking with my friend and saw a large bright green circular light flash across the sky. the light flashed across the sky and descended at a 45 degree angle until it disappeared into the horizon. my grandmother and family  has seen this before.  

i said, "wow what was that"! while i was on the phone with my friend and she said,"what are you ok". i said, "yes and that i just this green light that look like it hit the ground from the sky.". i felt excited yet freaked out that i saw something that i have seen before twice that is unexplainable.
content.summary: Green bright light circle flashed across the sky and descended to the horizon

content.detailedDescription: While driving down the old back roads near our farm,which is a mile north of cardross saskatchewan. my cousin and myself were practising driving. as we went up one of the big hills in the area we seen these three very bright lights in the sky. the lights were about five feet in diameter, with about another 15 or 20 feet in between them. they made a triangular shape and in between the three sphere's it appeared to be blacker then the night's sky it's self. it just hovered there while we we're watching it almost as if we were being watched ourselves. at the top of the hill we stopped and were in awe as well as stricken with curiosity of what could have made such bright lights at this time at night. at first we thought it could have a combine going back to the field or somewhere, but we soon figured that it's may the seed is barely in the ground let alone be harvested. so we knew it wasn't that. after a couple mins we drove down the hill and went to the top of the next hill, which was higher than the first, to get a better view of what we were looking at. when we got to the top the lights had disappeared. we decided to drive around and look for what we had just seen. we went to the end of the road, found nothing. we turned left and drove for about 2 miles, didn't see anything that could have made the lights. we turned around and went back and continued north to go to our pasture. another 2 miles and still nothing. we back tracked to our road but instead of going home we decided to go east and check it out that way. we went all the way to the highway and found nothing, we were stunned that we could not find what it was. then it occured to us that it must have been a ufo. when we got home we instantly told our family about what we had seen our grandfather then told us that other people had been seeing that same thing around the area before. he even told me about his own ufo experience back in the sixties.To this day me and my cousin still dont know what it was that showed its self to us on that night, but we are pretty sure we have a good idea that it was a ufo
content.summary: Driving down back roads saw it in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting; saturday 21st december at 8:30pm

we saw what we believe was a ufo in the sky last night. it was very low bright orange dazzling like a star but very low in the sky below the clouds, 4 times larger than venus which is the brightest star at the moment in the sky, we watched it come from the west moving east, and then before it went up into the clouds the bright orange disappeared and there was a solid black object, a solid object like an oblong shape, it had definite 2 corners, it was silent as it was flying as it went right over the house on its path it was taking, we watched it fly and there was no sound at all, it seemed to be under control and was flying not floating like a chinese lantern would, it had a path it took across the sky, it was stationary a few times. we all went out to watch it, 4 of us. my daughter spotted it from the lounge and we all ran outside to the front and watched it approach and go over the top of our house, so we ran around to the back of the garden to watch it go into the distance. my husband said it was not a flare, plane or helicopter, nor a lantern, it was too big to be any of these, it was bright sparkly like a star but muchly bigger and down low very low and silent. it was like a big huge star but orange. but low, about half way between the clouds (there was a few clouds around here and there) and the ground. it was a clear night with a few clouds here and there, calm weather, no wind. we are in roodekrans, roodepoort, gauteng, south africa. do you know if anyone else saw this object. the light was like flaring in directions, left, right and front., then it flicked off and we saw it was an object.
content.summary: Bright orange star (large) like object, hoovered then went in a straight path from west to east going over our house and other houses, light faded to a black oblong object

content.detailedDescription: I was staying the night with friends. we where playing outside in the driveway. one of my friends ask us to look up. i was stunned but excited. mesmerized by the object hovering. at that time there were no flying objects known to hover. it moved up and out of sight so fast i couldnt believe it. as fast as it left,it came back.It hoverd higher over the trees,then lowered above as before.It took off again faster than we could comprehend. iknew the only thing it could be is a ufo! the lights went around just before it took off. within a short time there was a big spotlight pointed to the skies.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Friends and i saw sphere hover over trees. moved upward at lightning speed. it came back as fast as it left. moved over several trees. left again.

content.detailedDescription: I was staying the night with friends. we where playing outside in the driveway. one of my friends ask us to look up. i was stunned but excited. mesmerized by the object hovering. at that time there were no flying objects known to hover. it moved up and out of sight so fast i couldnt believe it. as fast as it left,it came back.It hoverd higher over the trees,then lowered above as before.It took off again faster than we could comprehend. iknew the only thing it could be is a ufo! the lights went around just before it took off. within a short time there was a big spotlight pointed to the skies.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Friends and i saw sphere hover over trees. moved upward at lightning speed. it came back as fast as it left. moved over several trees. left again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my car with a friend at the top of a mountain in san francisco when i saw a very bright orange light hovered high above the city skyline.  it didn't make sense to me because in that direction was the pacific ocean.  also, this is a spot that i frequent often and had never seen it before.

i didn't say anything to my friend until i noticed it started moving slowly across the horizon.  i told her about it but she didn't believe me.  then i told her to look at the building lights and try to align it with the weird light...It was then that she realized and finally agreed the light was moving!

i was mainly in disbelief because i didn't want to believe it.  i do believe there may be other life forms out there but it never occurred to me that i'd ever see it in person myself.  anyways, it moved in a very slow, lateral fashion across the horizon for about 20 minutes or so.  it went over the sunset, golden gate park and richmond district before it finally shot straight up into space and that was it.
content.summary: Watched for nearly half an hour as an orange light slowly traveled over the city and then flew straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:12 pm on sunday, 22 dec 2013, i was walking my dogs in phoenixville pa on maisfield rd. i had good view of the night sky, however there were tall, 2-story houses partially blocking some of my view of the east and west of the horizon. 

i saw a bright orange circular object come from behind a house in my neighborhood (approximately 38 degrees from the eastern part of the horizon); the house was blocking the view and the object was far from the house. it was much brighter than a commercial jet or helicopter, which i see all the time when i walk my dogs; it also appeared to be bigger, but hard to judge size. as it came into view, it appeared to fly faster across the horizon than the commercial jets i see, in addition, it appeared to be climbing shortly after coming into view. it appeared to be a bright, circular object, possibly orb-like. the object was flying east to west. approximately, 12 second later, an identical object, flying in what appeared to be the identical flight path from the same initial viewing point appeared. another 12 seconds later, a 3rd object appeared following the same path. none of these objects made any sound. i often see commercial jet liners in the sky while walking my dogs and these objects were faster, brighter, and appeared to climb. as the objects moved to the western part of the horizon, they appeared to be up very high in the sky, and took on the appearance of being almost star-like. at first sighting, at arms length, i would say the objects were approximately smaller than a dime.

approximately 20 to 30 seconds after the 3rd object appeared, a 4th object appeared. this object had identical characteristics to the other 3 objects. it took the same flight path as the other objects.  the first 3 objects appeared to slow down a little, possible hovering, as if waiting (in the western part of the horizon), and they were at a great height from this point relative to when i first saw the objects.  

within 30 to 45 second intervals, objects continued to appear from the same initial viewing location following the identical flight path. at any given time, i could see 1 to 2 objects from a great distance in the western part of the horizon and a much closer, lower to the ground (relatively speaking) object traveling from the east and moving to the west. one after another, an object appeared. the last object was number 8.  the duration for all of this happening, until there was nothing to capture on my iphone 5, was approximately 9 minutes.

all the objects became dots in the sky and disappeared from my view. i was generally more interested in the close objects and spent more time looking at the initially viewing point in the easter part of the sky and did't pay much attention to wester part of the sky where the object had become very difficult to see. 

unfortunately, the first 3 objects flew one after the other, was an amazing sight to see. 
(there is no way commercial aircraft would have flied so close to each other and taken the same flight path.) i thought i had recorded these first 3 objects on my iphone, but i guess i was kind of shocked and excited and didn't realize i was not recording. also still learning the new ios 7 video camera interface. also, in the videos, you will see me occasionally moving the camera to the western part of the sky, but do not see anything in the video. i could actually see the distant objects with my eye when the iphone could not, but it was very small.

because these objects appeared to climb, move fast to the western horizon and appeared to slow down in the west part of the horizon, i do not think they were shooting stars. in the video, at one point i hear a commercial airplane, but i can tell that it's behind me and not coming from any of these 8 objects.

within seconds of seeing the first object, it had seemed so unusual that i had to take my iphone 5 out of my pocket to record it. when i saw the 2nd and 3rd, objects, one after the other taking the same flight path, i was in complete shock. as i child i grew up near o'hare airport in chicago, seeing planes all the time and i can't imagine any circumstances where you would see 8 moving object one, after the other, so bright, so fast, then appearing to slow down and wait for the others. also, the iphone video does not do these objects justice. they were much brighter then what appears in the videos. also, i recently saw the 1st rocket launch at nasa's new east coast space port, and these objects were much brighter than that rocket. there was no sign of any rocket trail. 

everything i saw tells me these were not conventional aircraft. also, i wonder if i had looked up in the sky earlier a minute or 3 earlier, if i would have seen additional objects, as i had just came around a turn and might have missed other objects.
content.summary: 8 fast moving silent orange objects, on after the other flew over the horizon

content.detailedDescription: When i was in my way home today i saw this glowing light like a fire in the sky. it was odd but i thought well maybe it's just a tower as i drove on it got brighter and brighter and larger and later. i stopped at home to get my boyfriend and we went to go see what it was. we drove for around 20 miles till we were right underneath it. it just hovered.There was this perfectly round cloud that seemed to be on fire. it was moving in all different directions.Still at this moment it looks like a fire in the sky and i am back home 20 miles away.
content.summary: Fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription: When i was in my way home today i saw this glowing light like a fire in the sky. it was odd but i thought well maybe it's just a tower as i drove on it got brighter and brighter and larger and later. i stopped at home to get my boyfriend and we went to go see what it was. we drove for around 20 miles till we were right underneath it. it just hovered.There was this perfectly round cloud that seemed to be on fire. it was moving in all different directions.Still at this moment it looks like a fire in the sky and i am back home 20 miles away.
content.summary: Fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My son zack and i saw what we believe to have been 2 ufo's! my second sighting here now! he called me outside at sunset to look.......There were two stationary very large lights in the sky, where the evening star shows up...But later. there were jets also....Because their contrails were orange in the setting sun. one of the lights just straight up disappeared while i was looking at them. so, i went to get some binoculars...And what i saw is hard to describe. it looked at first like an a-frame shaped craft....Looked like it was likely mettalic since that's what color it looked like. then, as i was watching it...It looked like a plane...Jet maybe, not sure, with contrails coming down from the wings giving it that a shape........But......If they were contrails....How come they were not lit up orange like the jets flying across the sky? and it did not move at all...Stayed in the same place for about 15 or 20 minutes. then, the "contrail" things disappeared...And a few seconds later, so did the craft.
we were standing on my front porch in ranchos de taos, nm at the time these were observed.  the lights were so large and stationary, it was hard to miss them.  my son and i both instantly felt these were ufos.  
the object that i observed through the binoculars was really different.  i could draw a sketch if you would like. please feel free to contact me if you wish.
thanks!
heidi carr
content.summary: Two very large bright lights, stationary, in the w/sw sky this evening at sunset.

content.detailedDescription:
I just heard a long "roaring sound " . it was outside . i talked to 5 people
and they all heard it at the same time last night . each described the roar and the time as the same .  one saw a bright flash of light at the same time . do you have any other reports ? there was a newspaper report in southern illinois that said the roar happened at 6:30 in that area . 


http://www.Mufon.Com/reportufo.Html  this not my recording --but the sound i heard matches this .
content.summary: Roaring sound -lasting about 1 minute to one and half minute .

content.detailedDescription: Came back from walmart finishing shoping, looked out to the gulf and saw the object. it was huge and the brightest thing in the sky pulled off to the side of the road and watched it for a good 15min. the object had a red lazer beam shooting out the side and reflected off the gulf. by the time i got home and went back up there the object was gone. contacted faa and had nothing on radar in my area. authorities were contacted by faa to investigate. this was no man made object or aircraft never seen anything like it. it just disapeared out of site.
content.summary: Saw object for 15min. 3 people had a red beam shooting out, authority's came out to investigate..

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fianc��� were on our way to the mall around 6:45-6:50 to get e-cig liquid when we both spotted a light flying south at a quick speed(quicker than a helicopter) when it suddenly changed direction(unlike a helicopter) towards us. when it was passing over i noticed it had three solid blue-ish with white and green lights. i knew it wasn't a helicopter because the lights weren't in the same pattern and weren't blinking. we then lost sight of it. once we left the mall at 7:05 we saw it again flying east at a slow speed. at the same time a helicopter was flying in its direction. the object came to a complete stop and as th helicopter got closer the object flew the other direction then shot down at an angle at high speed and seemed to hover over some houses. my fianc��� said she saw the object go back up but i had lost sight of it due to the trees.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving towards mall when spotted flying erratically.
